actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for the option to use a diversion program to treat maternal drug abuse in a family-centered medical context, and for other purposes.
short_title: Flexibility in Family Sentencing Act of 2016

summary.text:
Flexibility in Family Sentencing Act of 2016

This bill amends the federal criminal code to authorize pre-judgment probation for a pregnant or postpartum woman who: (1) commits a specified low-level offense, and (2) is an addict.

 The conditions of probation must require participation in a court-approved drug treatment program and periodic medical evaluations.

titles.title: Flexibility in Family Sentencing Act of 2016
